metadata.description: A 'Return of the Originals' event! Before the caped crusader patrolled the streets, before horn head prowled the back alleys, this original dark avenger hunted evil men. The Black Bat is back, and hell's coming with him! Blinded in a mobster's attempt to destroy evidence, DA Anthony Quinn sharpens his other senses and uses his sixth 'radar' sense to work outside the law, doing whatever it takes to bring criminals to justice.
metadata.name: Black Bat
